title: User can access General Account Settings (Mobile Device Only)
custom_preconds: Given the user is on https://beta-aws.mlb.com/account/security
custom_steps: When viewing the Change Password section from a mobile device
custom_expected: Then the user should be able to navigate the Account dropdown and go to General Account Settings

title: General Account Settings has the field: Name ( and its sub items: First, Last)
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Profile Section
custom_steps: When viewing the General Account Settings
custom_expected: Then user should see the field: Name (First, Last)

title: General Account Settings has the field: Nickname and its sub items (input field)
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Profile Section
custom_steps: When viewing the General Account Settings
custom_expected: Then user should see the field: Nickname and an input field

title: General Account Settings has the field: Contact (Email Address, Mobile Number)
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Profile Section
custom_steps: When viewing the General Account Settings
custom_expected: Then user should see the Contact fields: (Email Address, Mobile Number)

title: General Account Settings has the field: Language (English, Spanish)
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Profile Section
custom_steps: When viewing the General Account Settings
custom_expected: Then user should see the field: Language (English, Spanish)

title: General Account Settings must have an About field and it should have all the fields displayed with their default state/selection for drop downs
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Profile Section
custom_steps: When viewing the About field
custom_expected:
Then the user should see the following fields, options: 
What year did you become a fan? (Default: Year)
Date of Birth (Day, Month, Year)
Gender (Gender) 
Income (Income)
Marital Status (Martial Status)
Number of Children (Number of Children)
Occupation
Hometown

title: General Account Settings has the field: 'Manage Your Account' field and its sub item (Delete Account button)
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Profile Section
custom_steps: When viewing the General Account Settings
custom_expected: Then user should see the field: Manage Your Account (Delete My Account button)

title: Save Changes button should be disabled and Cancel button should be enabled when user visits the account profile section without making changes(default state)
custom_preconds: Given the user is on https://www.mlb.com/account AND is logged in
custom_steps: When the user first visits the account profile section
custom_expected: Then Save Changes button should be disabled and Cancel button should be enabled in every submenu of the General Settings: Name, Nickname, Contact, Language, About

title: User should be able to see a pop up to cancel the account
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Profile Section
custom_steps: When viewing the General Account Settings and goes to Manage Your Account Field and presses "Delete My Account"
custom_expected: Then user should see a pop up with 'Delete Account' header

title: User is allowed to change their email.
custom_preconds:
Given the user is on the Profile Section
And viewing the General Account Settings
custom_steps:
When deleting old email and entering a valid email address
And after clicking Save, user logs out of the account and logs back in
custom_expected: Then Contact field-email display the saved email address.

title: User is allowed to cancel changes to email and mobile number before saving them
custom_preconds:
Given the user is on the Profile Section
And viewing the General Account Settings
custom_steps:
When entering an email address and Mobile Number
And clicking Cancel
custom_expected: Then the Contact fields are unchanged and display the original email address and mobile number.

title: Save Changes button should not be disabled after entering valid input.
custom_preconds: Given the user is on https://www.mlb.com/account AND is logged in
custom_steps: When the user first visits the account profile section and enters valid data into input fields
custom_expected: Then Save button changes state from disabled to enabled when entering only letters into First Name input field, entering 4 letter string into Nickname field, entering 10 numbers as a mobile number, selecting English in Languages, entering any city into a HomeTown in About

title: User is prompted and cannot save changes after entering a number into First Name field
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Account Profile Section
custom_steps: WHEN in the General Account Settings section and entering a numeric value into First Name input field
custom_expected: THEN Save button is disabled and 'Please provide valid name' is displayed

title: User is prompted and cannot save changes entering any special characters into NickName input field
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Account Profile Section
custom_steps: WHEN in the General Account Settings section and entering any special characters into Nickname input field
custom_expected: THEN Save button is disabled and 'Please provide valid name' is displayed

title: User is prompted and cannot save changes after entering letters only into mobile phone number
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Account Profile Section
custom_steps: WHEN in the General Account Settings section and entering a numeric value into Mobile Number input field
custom_expected: THEN Save button is disabled and 'Please provide valid phone number' is displayed

title: User should be able to save changes to their profile in Nickname, Languages, About
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Profile Section
custom_steps: When viewing the General Account Settings
custom_expected: Then User should be able to save changes to their profile in Nickname, in Languages and in About that remain there after the user re-logins into the account profile and checks those sub menus.

title: User should be able to cancel edits to their profile in NickName, Languages, About
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Profile Section
custom_steps: When making edits to their General Account Settings
custom_expected: User should be able to cancel edits to their profile in Nickname, in Languages and in About before saving them.

title: Presence of the correct fields
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Change Password section
custom_steps: When the user expands the Change Password section row/submenu
custom_expected:
Then user should see: 
Password,
'Change your password or receive a notification of what your password is.',
Change your password, 
Current Password, 
New Password,
Re-type New Password,
Forgot your password?, 
Password Guidelines: Must be 8 - 15 characters, One uppercase letter,One lowercase letter,One number,No Special Characters

title: Change Password's  body title and body description presence verification when submenu Row is collapsed.
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Account Profile Section (/account/)
custom_steps: After clicking on the Change Password section in the main menu and being redirected to /account/security
custom_expected: Then  both span items under account__security-body-title are present/displayed

title: Change Password's submenu items default state verification when the submenu row is expanded.
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Account Profile Section (/account/)
custom_steps: After clicking on the Change Password section in the main menu, clicking on the 'Password' submenu and being redirected to /account/security
custom_expected: Then save button is disabled, cancel button is enabled , Current Password input field is enabled, New Password and Re-Type Password input fields are disabled.

title: Collapse of the password submenu on clicking cancel
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Change Password section
custom_steps: When the user expands the Change Password section row and presses Cancel
custom_expected: Then value of account__security-body-info  changes to account__security-body-info collapsed and the spans under account__security-body-title are present/displayed

title: Collapse of the password submenu on clicking save
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Change Password section
custom_steps: When the user expands the Change Password section row and enters valid input into new password field and matching input into re-enter password field
custom_expected: Then value of account__security-body-info  changes to account__security-body-info collapsed and the spans under account__security-body-title are present/displayed

title: Collapse of the password submenu after entering infomation and clicking cancel
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Change Password section
custom_steps: When the user expands the Change Password section row, enters Current Password and presses Cancel
custom_expected: Then value of account__security-body-info  changes to account__security-body-info collapsed and the spans under account__security-body-title are present/displayed

title: Confirm submenu input fields and buttons state after entering any Current Password
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Change Password section
custom_steps: When attempting to change passwords
custom_expected: Then new password input field is disabled until the user enters any input into current password input field. Save button and re-enter input fields remain disabled. Cancel button remains enabled.

title: Confirm submenu input fields and buttons state after entering any current password and new password
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Change Password section
custom_steps: When attempting to change passwords, after entering Current and New password that meets requirements
custom_expected: Then the Re-Type input field is active, so is current password, new password and cancel button , but not the save button.

title: Confirming submenu input fields and buttons state after entering any new password, password guidelines new password and matching re-enter password
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Change Password section
custom_steps: When the user makes any changes to their password and the user is validated against password
custom_expected: Then the save button is active and so are Current Password, New Password, Re-Type Password, cancel button.

title: Confirm redirect after successful password change
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Change Password section
custom_steps: When the Save button is enabled
custom_expected: Then when user is clicking on the save button, the page is being redirected to envUrl + account/security

title: Validate fail on the use of an old password
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Change Password section
custom_steps: When the user expands the Change Password section row, enters Current Password, error free values into New Password and Re-type New Password, presses save and logs out.
custom_expected: Then when trying to log back in with the old password , the use will not be able to log in: the error message will be displayed-"Authentication Error. Please check email and/or password and try again." and user will remain on the log in page

title: Validate the password change
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Change Password section
custom_steps: When the user expands the Change Password section row, enters Current Password, error free values into New Password and Re-type New Password, presses save and log out.
custom_expected: Then user successfully logs in with the new password: the page is redirected to home page

title: User is redirected to a forgot password page after clicking "Forgot your password?"
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Change Password section
custom_steps: When user clicks "Forgot your password"
custom_expected: Then user is brought to the forgot password page (/forgot-password) to retrieve their password

title: User can get a password retrieval confirmation message after clicking "Forgot your password?" and submitting their email
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Change Password section
custom_steps: When user clicks "Forgot your password" and the page redirects to .../forgot-password
custom_expected: Then after the user enters email address and presses Get New Password Button, message 'Your new password has been sent to you via e-mail.' is dispalyed.

title: User can get an error message: "Incorrect password" after entering wrong current password while trying to change the password
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Change Password section
custom_steps: When the user expands the Change Password section row, enters wrong value for Current Password, error free values into New Password and Re-type New Password, presses save.
custom_expected: Then user is redirected back to /account/security page and Current Password input field has the error message displayed.

title: Password retrieval email should link user back to Account Profile
custom_preconds:
Given the user is on the Change Password section
 and the user selects forgot password and enters their email
custom_steps: When receiving the email with an updated password
custom_expected: Then user should be linked back to https://www.mlb.com/account/security

title: User gets RED alert message on the BOTTOM of the page if the change password was unsuccessful
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Change Password section
custom_steps: When the user expands the Change Password section and enters NON VALID current password and matching valid input into new password and re-enter password fields, presses Save button.
custom_expected: Then the alert message is displayed: 'Whoops, something went wrong!' in RED color and on the BOTTOM of the page.

title: Error Language for new password not meeting requirements: "Please provide valid password"
custom_preconds: Given the user is on /account
custom_steps: When the user is in the Change Password area and user had entered any into current password and invalid string into new password (check against multiple entries that check all of the password requirements)
custom_expected: Then Error language should read:"Please provide valid password"

title: Error Language for current and new password are the same: "Cannot match current password"
custom_preconds: Given the user is on  /account
custom_steps: When the user is in the Change Password area and current and new password are the same
custom_expected: Then Error language should read:  "Cannot match current password"

title: Error language for new and re-type new pw do not match: "Passwords don't match"
custom_preconds: Given the user is on  /account
custom_steps: When the user is in the Change Password area and entering any value to current password and the new and re-type passwords that do not match
custom_expected: Then Error language should read: "Passwords don't match"

title: Confirm user can see if New password matches the password requirements
custom_preconds: Given the user is on  /account
custom_steps: When the user is entering a valid new password into New Password input field
custom_expected:
Then the new passwords is validated against the password requirements which are displayed as a bulletined list which becomes green fully:
Cannot use current password
Must be 8 - 15 characters
One uppercase letter
One lowercase letter
One number
No special characters  before the re-type new password field becomes active

title: Confirm UI reflects that the New Password contains capital letters
custom_preconds: Given the user is on  /account
custom_steps: When the user is entering a new password that contains only capital letters
custom_expected: Then UI changes the color of 'One uppercase letter' from blue to green and leaves the rest of the requirements in blue.

title: Confirm UI reflects that the New Password contains lower case letter
custom_preconds: Given the user is on  /account
custom_steps: When the user is entering a new password that contains only lowercase letters
custom_expected: Then UI changes the color of 'One lowercase letter' from blue to green and leaves the rest of the requirements in blue.

title: Confirm UI reflects that the New Password contains numbers
custom_preconds: Given the user is on  /account
custom_steps: When the user is entering a new password that contains only numbers
custom_expected: Then UI changes the color of 'One number' from blue to green and leaves the rest of the requirements in blue.

title: Confirm UI reflects that the New Password does not contain special characters
custom_preconds: Given the user is on  /account
custom_steps: When the user is entering a new password that contains only special character
custom_expected: Then UI changes the color of 'No Special Characters' from blue to green and leaves the rest of the requirements in blue.

custom_steps: When viewing the All Team Newsletters section of the Email Newsletters area
custom_expected: Then User should be able to see "All Team Newsletters" that can be subscribed for the teams they have selected.

title: User should be able to see which of the email newsletters they are subscribed to

custom_steps: When viewing the Email Newsletters area
custom_expected: Then User should be able to see which of the email newsletters they are subscribed to

title: User should be able to select or de-select email newsletters.
custom_preconds: Given the user is on https://www.mlb.com/account AND is logged in
custom_steps: When viewing the Email Newsletters area
custom_expected: Then User should be able to select or de-select email newsletters.

title: User should be able to pick multiple newsletters for single or multiple teams.

custom_steps: When viewing the All Team Newsletters section of the Email Newsletters area
custom_expected: Then User should be able to pick either single or multiple email newsletters for single or multiple teams.

title: User should be able to save changes.
custom_preconds: Given the user is on https://www.mlb.com/account AND is logged in
custom_steps:
When viewing the Email Newsletters area 
AND making updates the email newsletters they are signed up for
custom_expected: Then User should be able to save changes.

title: Save Changes button should be disabled when user first visits the account profile section.
custom_preconds: Given the user is on https://www.mlb.com/account AND is logged in
custom_steps: When viewing the Email Newsletters area
custom_expected: Then Save Changes button should be disabled when user first visits Email Newsletters section of the account profile section.

title: Save Changes button should be disabled unless it detects a change.
custom_preconds: Given the user is on https://www.mlb.com/account AND is logged in
custom_steps: When viewing the Email Newsletters area
custom_expected: Then Save Changes button should be disabled unless it detects a change.

title: If user does not have avatar set, display generic avatar image at top of profile on the account profile overlay
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Account Profile Section
custom_steps: When viewing the avatar section & the user has generic avatar
custom_expected: Then display generic avatar image at top of profile & also account icon is generic on the page and it is in header and account profile button is generic avatar

title: If user does not have avatar set, display generic avatar image at top of profile on the account profile overlay
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Profile Section
custom_steps: When viewing the avatar overlay section & the user has generic avatar
custom_expected: Then user should be able to see generic avatar on the account overlay

title: If user does not have first name field filled, display "Your MLB account" in avatar section

custom_steps: When user does not have first name field filled
custom_expected: Then  display "Your MLB account" in avatar section

title: If user sets an avatar, display set avatar image at top of profile on the account profile page

custom_steps: When user sets an avatar
custom_expected: Then user should be able to see selected avatar on the account profile page, and it is in header and account profile button is selected avatar

title: If user sets an avatar, display set avatar image at top of profile on the account profile overlay

custom_steps: When user sets an avatar
custom_expected: Then user should be able to see selected avatar on the account overlay

title: If user fills out first name, display "(Name)'s MLB Account" in avatar section
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Account Profile Section
custom_steps: When user fills out first name
custom_expected: Then display "(Name)'s MLB Account" in avatar section

title: User should be able to access Support area
custom_preconds: Given the user is on https://www.mlb.com/account
custom_steps: When clicking on the Support area
custom_expected: Then User should be able to access Support area

title: MLB. TV Help Center contains the correct language

custom_steps: When viewing the MLB.TV Help Center link
custom_expected:
Then MLB. TV Help Center contains the correct language: 

"For MLB.TV support you can visit our MLB.TV Help Center where we have full online support during live games."

title: MLB. TV Help Center contains the correct link

custom_steps: When viewing the MLB.TV Help Center link
custom_expected: Then MLB. TV Help Center contains the correct link: https://www.mlb.com/live-stream-games/help-center

title: Contact Us area contains the correct language

custom_steps: When viewing the Contact Us link
custom_expected:
Then Contact Us area contains the correct language

"For general MLB support you can visit our Contact Us area where you can contact us by phone, email or mail."

title: Contact Us area contains the correct link

custom_steps: When viewing the Contact Us area
custom_expected: Then Contact Us area contains the correct link: https://www.mlb.com/official-information/contact

title: User can access the Favorites & Follows area (Mobile only)
custom_preconds: Given the user is viewing the Account Profile section
custom_steps: When viewing the Account Profile menu options
custom_expected: Then the user can see and click the Favorites & Follows area which will change the button's color on click

title: User can set favorite preferences for teams and ballparks
custom_preconds: Given the user is viewing the Account Profile section and clicks Favorites and Follows
custom_steps: When viewing the Favorites and Follows section.
custom_expected: Then user can select and save favorite preferences for teams and ballparks in Favorite Team, Follow Team, Rival Teams, Favorite BallParks and these changes can be seen after returning to the account Favorite and Follows.

title: User can set favorite preferences for players
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing the Account Profile section and clicks Favorites and Follows
custom_steps: WHEN viewing the Favorites and Follows section.
custom_expected: THEN user can select and save favorite preferences for teams and ballparks in Favorite Players, in Follow Players and these changes can be seen after returning to the account favorite and follows.

title: User is able to remove previously selected and saved in Favorite Team, Follow Teams, Rival Teams and Favorite BallParks
custom_preconds: Given the user is viewing the Account Profile section
custom_steps: When viewing the Favorites and Following section
custom_expected: Then user is able to remove selections they have previously selected and saved and these changes can be seen after returning to the account's Favorite and Follows.

title: User is able to remove previously selected and saved in Favorite Player and Follow Players
custom_preconds: Given the user is viewing the Account Profile section
custom_steps: When viewing the Favorites and Following section
custom_expected: Then user is able to remove selections they have previously selected and saved and these changes can be seen after returning to the account's Favorite and Follows.

title: User is able to cancel any edits made in Favorite Team, Follow Team, Rival Teams and Favorite Ballparks
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing the Account Profile section
custom_expected: THEN user is able to select a team or ballpark (not pressing save) and pressing cancel would unselect those selections.

title: User is able to cancel any edits made in Favorite Players and Follow Players
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing the Account Profile section
custom_steps: WHEN viewing the Favorites and Following section
custom_expected: THEN user is able to select a player (not pressing save) and pressing cancel would unselect those selections.

title: For `Favorite Team` user is able to select ONLY one option.

custom_steps: When viewing the Favorites and Following section
custom_expected: Then user is trying to multi-select (2-5) in Favorite Team only one team is shown to be selected.

title: User is able to multi-select teams and ballparks

custom_steps: WHEN viewing the Favorites and Following section
custom_expected: THEN the user is able to multi-select options (2-5) for teams and ball parks in Follow Team, Rival Teams, Favorite BallParks.

title: User is able to multi-select players
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing the Account Profile section
custom_steps: WHEN viewing the Favorites and Following section
custom_expected: THEN the user is able to multi-select options (2-5) for players in Favorite Players and in Follow Players

title: User is able to indicate rankings (a primary favorite) when multi selecting teams and ballparks in Follow Team, Rival Teams, Favorite Ballparks

custom_steps: When viewing the Favorites and Following section
custom_expected: Then after clicking on team/ballpark icon, the icon is tagged with the rank.

title: In Favorite Teams, Follow Teams, Rival Teams and Favorite BallParks: User is able to see what they have selected

custom_steps: When viewing the Favorites and Following section
custom_expected: Then the selected team is marked as active and icon's border color has changed from grey to black in Favorite Teams, Follow Teams, Favorite BallParks and in Rival Teams.

title: In Favorite Players and in Follow Players: User is able to see what they have selected
custom_preconds: Given the user is viewing the Account Profile section
custom_steps: When viewing the Favorites and Following section
custom_expected: Then the selected team is marked as active and icon's border color has changed from grey to black in Favorite Players and Follow Players.

title: 5 day grace period from when a user originally makes a purchase.
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Subscriptions section of the Account Profile
custom_steps: When the user makes a purchase
custom_expected: Then there is a 5 day grace period from when the user originally made the purchase.

title: Grace period is honored when inside 5 day grace period
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Subscriptions section of the Account Profile
custom_steps: When the user is IN the 5 day grace period
custom_expected: Then the grace period should be honored allowing the user to cancel for this season

title: User adheres to the 4 step Cancellation Flow
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Subscriptions section of the Account Profile
custom_steps: When attempting to cancel a subscription or automatic renewal
custom_expected:
Then user adheres to the 4 step Cancellation Flow:
Step 1 = click in Subscription status section and see your subscription status
Step 2 = clicking "cancel subscription/cancel automatic renewal" button and initiating cancellation flow (in modal)
Step 3 = confirming cancellation request (in modal)
Step 4 = clicking "return to account" button and returning to profile, where copy indicating you have submitted a cancellation request will surface

title: Flow is the same for users all users. (In or out of grace period)
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Subscriptions section of the Account Profile
custom_steps: When the user is either IN or OUT of the grace period
custom_expected: Then the cancellation flow is still the same.

title: If the user is out of the grace period then subscription is canceled for next season
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Subscriptions section of the Account Profile
custom_steps: When the user is OUT of the grace period
custom_expected: Then the users subscription is canceled for next season

title: Clicking "Cancel Automatic Renewal", brings up modal
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Subscriptions section of the Account Profile
custom_steps: When clicking "Cancel Automatic Renewal"
custom_expected: Then the user is shown a pop up modal

title: User should see "reasonForCancel" with dropdown menu listing reasons to cancel
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Subscriptions section of the Account Profile
custom_steps: When the user is going through step 2 of the Cancellation Flow
custom_expected: Then user should see "reasonForCancel" with dropdown menu listing reasons to cancel

title: Submit Cancel button should not be clickable until reason for cancellation has been selected from dropdown menu
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Subscriptions section of the Account Profile
custom_steps: When the user is going through step 2 of the cancellation flow
custom_expected: Then Submit Cancel button should not be clickable until reason for cancellation has been selected from dropdown menu

title: After Cancelling the user should see "The automatic renewal of your subscription has been cancelled"
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Subscriptions section of the Account Profile
custom_steps: When the user has cancelled their automatic renewal
custom_expected: Then user should see this message "The automatic renewal of your subscription has been cancelled"

title: User should receive email confirmation of cancellation
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Subscriptions section of the Account Profile
custom_steps: When the user completes the cancellation flow
custom_expected: Then user should receive email confirmation of cancellation

title: User should see "Return to account" button after cancellation
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Subscriptions section of the Account Profile
custom_steps: When the user has completed step 2 of the cancellation process
custom_expected: Then user should see "Return to account" button after cancellation

title: User should be returned to Account Profile after clicking "Return to account" button
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Subscriptions section of the Account Profile
custom_steps: When the user finishes the cancellation flow and clicks "Return to account" button
custom_expected: Then user should be returned to Account Profile

title: Upon returning to account, a copy indicating you have submitted a cancellation request will surface
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Subscriptions section of the Account Profile
custom_steps: When the user has completed the cancellation flow and has returned back to their account
custom_expected: Then user should see a copy indicating you have submitted a cancellation request will surface

title: Credit Card information contains the correct fields
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Account Profile section
custom_steps: When viewing Credit Card information
custom_expected:
Then Credit Card information contains the correct fields:
Fields to include (screenshots attached):
Name on Card
Credit Card Type (MasterCard, Visa, Discover, Amex)
Credit Card Number
Expiration Date (Month, Year)
MasterCard logo + "preferred by MLB"
First Name
Last Name
Address
Address 2
City
State/Province
Zip/Postal Code
Country
Mobile Number
Check box for Primary Credit Card ("Set as Primary")

title: Save button is disabled and Cancel button is enabled as a default state and when the card and billing info all empty
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Account Profile section
custom_steps: When in Manage Subscriptions, Payment Methods and clicks add card
custom_expected: Then the save button is disabled and cancel button is enabled by default

title: Save button is enabled only after all valid info is added
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Account Profile section
custom_steps: When the user is in Manage Subscriptions, Payment Methods, pressing add a Card and entering Card and Billing info
custom_expected: Then the save button is disabled when partial information is entered and enabled only when all information(card, billing) is entered and information is valid

title: User should be able to add American Express with 4 digit long cvv and when using 5 digit long, the user is prompted with an error message
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Account Profile section
custom_steps: When the user is adding a card and billing information, new American Express card info with 4 digits long CVV and then 5 digits long CVV
custom_expected: Then with 4 digit long CVV and valid billing information, the save button is enabled, with 5 digit long CVV: the save button is disabled and there is a prompt displayed to enter the correct CVV

title: User should be prompted with an error message when attempting to enter diners club card
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Account Profile section
custom_steps:
When the user is adding a new credit card
And enters a diner's club card
custom_expected: Then the user is prompted that the diner's club cannot be used

title: User should be prompted with an error message when attempting to enter invalid expiration month and year
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Account Profile section
custom_steps:
When the user is adding a new credit card
And enters an incorrect Credit Card expiration date
custom_expected:
Then the user is prompted which field contains the incorrect information
But is not allowed to save.

title: User should be prompted with red colored border when entering wrong phone number
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Account Profile section
custom_steps:
When the user is adding a new credit card
And enters an incorrectly formatted phone number
custom_expected:
Then the user should be prompted which field contains the incorrect information
But is not allowed to save.

title: For saved cards, should not be able to edit Name on Card, Credit Card Type, or Credit Card Number, but can delete them
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Account Profile section
custom_steps: When viewing a saved credit card
custom_expected: Then user should not be able to edit Name on Card, Credit Card Type, or Credit Card Number, but only delete a card

title: User should be able to see a list of their current credit cards after returning to account after saving the cards
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Account Profile section
custom_steps: When the user is viewing their payment methods
custom_expected: Then the user should be able to see a list of their current credit cards saved during previous sessions

title: Error messaging should be displayed if user tries to add more than 5 cards: "Maximum of 5 payment methods allowed"
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Account Profile section
custom_steps: When attempting to add more than 5 cards
custom_expected: Then Error messaging should be displayed:  "Maximum of 5 payment methods allowed"

title: User should be able to designate a card as Primary Credit Card and only one card can be a Primary card
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Account Profile section
custom_steps: When the user is viewing their payment methods
custom_expected: Then user should be able to designate a card as Primary Credit Card. When saving a second card as a primary card, the first saved card is unmarked as a primary and the second card is marked as one.

title: User should see the border color red on the phone number input field when entering letters into it
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Account Profile section
custom_steps: When the user is in Manage Subscriptions, Payment Methods and entering a letters into phone number input field
custom_expected: Then user should see the border of the phone input field turns red color

title: Visual in Change Password: User gets an alert message if the change password was successful
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Change Password section
custom_steps: When the user expands the Change Password section and enters VALID current password and matching valid input into new password and re-enter password fields, presses Save button.
custom_expected: Then the alert message is displayed: 'Account saved successfully!', the bar of the message is Green and message is located on the bottom of the page.

title: Visual in Change Password: GREEN Successful alert message- 'Account Saved Successfully' , is displayed on the BOTTOM of the page after valid password change.
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Change Password section
custom_steps: When the user expands the Change Password section and enters VALID current password and matching valid input into new password and re-enter password fields, presses Save button.
custom_expected: Then the alert message is displayed: 'Account Saved Successfully!' in GREEN color bar and on the BOTTOM of the page.(Confirm text, color, position)

title: Visual in Favorites and Follows, in General Settings: User is notified when saving an update to the Account Profile
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Account Profile
custom_steps: When saving an update to their profile
custom_expected: Then user is notified when saving an update to the Account Profile by Message : 'Account Save Successfully!'

title: Visual in Favorites and Follows, in General Settings: Upon successful saved changes, the color of the notification bar that appears on bottom of browser window is GREEN
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Account Profile
custom_steps: When successfully saving a change to their profile
custom_expected: Then green bar appears on bottom of browser window

title: Visual in Favorites and Follows, in General Settings: Green bar is fixed to the bottom of the browser window
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Account Profile
custom_steps: When successfully saving a change
custom_expected: Then alert message GREEN bar is fixed to the bottom of the browser window

title: Visual in Favorites and Follows, in General Settings: Upon an unsuccessful attempt to save changes, a red bar appears on bottom of browser window
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Account Profile
custom_steps: When entering an email address that already exists
custom_expected: Then red bar appears on bottom of browser window with the message: "An account with this email already exists"
